descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17038-1-1337000224.jpg[/img]
Soul Eater : 

Set in the Shinigami technical school for weapon meisters, the series revolves around 3 groups of each a weapon meister and a human weapon. Trying to make the latter a \"Death Scythe\" and thus fit for use by the Shinigami, they must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and 1 witch.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]This mod is neither Lore friendly or intended to be lore friendly[/b]

Now it\'s your turn... Take over for Maka Albarn and continue collecting souls for the Death god.

There are 2 versions, a Weapon, and a summon... The summon gives you real feeling of calling on the weapon whenever needed.

However, if you use the weapon itself you can upgrade it with Black Soul gem.

This weapon can be found BEHIND [ The Drunken Huntsman ] inn at Whiterun. It is not directly behind but it\'s there... Just search a little, happy... Hunting AAAAHAHAHAHA!!!!1111oneeleven (<_<)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have used a mesh from killeromar, who kindly gave me permission to use it, if you want their mod the link is

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17004

---------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Misa Jackson
